content:
This is true. I was going to post about this soon. Might as well do it now. :).

We've been experimenting with various flows to the sessions since October. Our next meeting will include a retrospective by the members who have participated. Then we plan to discuss next steps which will likely include recording future sessions. I'll know more after we complete the retro.

Another general interest event is planned for our next RRC on Feb 3rd. @pnkfelix has graciously agreed to do a demo of Pernosco for the group. He plans to record the demo and post it to his YouTube channel. It will be available for everyone to watch and learn from.

I'll update here following the retrospective on Feb 3rd. Stay tuned!
